item.title: Improving model performance on minority class with SMOTE and ADASYN
item.description: Overview The dataset is related to red variant of the Portuguese “Vinho Verde” wine, which contains physicochemical of 1599 records of red wines. Initially, dataset included a dependent feature [quality], which is a score between 0 to 10. The higher the score, the better the wine. However, most of the scores are concentrated between 5 or 6. Project has turned this into a classification problem, by setting an arbitrary cutoff for wine quality of 7 and higher classified as ‘good/1’ and the remainder as ‘bad/0’.
